name: Fantasy Smith VR
description:
FantasySmithVR is a stimulation-type VR game. Players can experience how to make a weapon, and how to interact with characters or creatures in the shop.
The fantasy world setting makes the forging more interesting, magic potion and floating crystals virtually engage players in an incredible magic world.
The biggest feature of the game is that you can create your own weapon what you like, the sword handle and the gem can mix freely, you can also buy the special handle or the gem in the market, completes the more personal weapon.
